data.description:
Uptale is the XR Spatial Learning platform empowering enterprises & schools to create and share rich interactive Virtual Reality experiences from simple 360° captures and no code.

Uptale Player is the best way to live Uptale experiences and learn with Oculus.
Install, log in and find all your training programs, ready to launch.

The application requires the microphone for learning content that allows you to record yourself speaking in specific situations, and you may listen back for assessment. It also allows for different learning paths assisted with voice recognition. There is a visible indicator when the microphone is active.

changelog.change_log:
This version mostly includes bug fixes, notably:
- Fixing dependencies randomly and not consistently not triggered
- Fixing some infinite loading screen
- Improving media management and 3d object handling in editor
- Improving behavior on 3D objects when hoovered
- Fixing tag border that no longer rendered as expected with a wrong opacity

This release include the following.
- Enhanced Tags: Introducing Text, Information, and Quizz tags with advanced visual capabilities including border, corner radius, and background configurations.
- Improved Display: Offers better wrapping, sizing options, and rendering, along with partial markdown support.
- Spatial Editor Support: Newly integrated support for the Spatial Editor with these enhanced tags.
- Remote Management: Enables remote control for downloading content directly through the platform. Register your device and manage its content effortlessly.
- Hand Tracking Feature: Temporarily removed from certain devices, with plans for future reintegration.
Additional Changes:
- Lobby Page Update: The title is now prominently displayed on the lobby page.
- Persistent Lobby: Lobby settings are now saved and restored across application reboots.
- Updated Branding: Introducing a refreshed Uptale logo.
Multiple bug fixes

• Randomisation des réponses aux quizz
• Support de la langue Arabe
• Cliquer une deuxième fois un tag son relance le son au début
• Optimisation des performances
